resources.string: 1. On the Home Page Open Camera or Choose existing image from gallery or your file storage.
2. After selecting an image click on get result to find containing object or product details.
3. Your selected image will be stored in History so that you can re-search later.
4. If you want to add a particular image to favorite then you can add that image from the History where you can see the heart icon for adding that image to Favorites.
Thank You For using Our App!!!
